/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up on either side of the street, their uniform color palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The trees, mostly bare, stand tall against the clear blue sky, their leafless branches suggesting the chill of winter or the crispness of early spring. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, as if the city is just waking up to a new day.
